Class CustomCollection

java.lang.Object
org.javaLab5.collection.CustomCollection
public class CustomCollection extends Object
Represents a custom collection of Route objects. This collection ensures uniqueness of Route IDs and provides various utility methods for managing, updating, and retrieving routes.

  • Method Details

    • addElement

      public void addElement(Route route) throws Exception
      Adds a new Route to the collection. Ensures that the route ID is unique.
      Parameters:
      route - the Route object to be added
      Throws:
      Exception - if the ID is already present in the collection

    • updateElement

      public void updateElement(Route route)
      Updates an existing Route by removing the old entry with the same ID and adding the new one.
      Parameters:
      route - the Route object with updated data

    • removeByID

      public void removeByID(int id)
      Removes a Route from the collection by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Route to be removed

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all elements from the collection.

    • getRoutesDescriptions

      public String getRoutesDescriptions()
      Retrieves descriptions of all Routes in the collection.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with descriptions of all routes

    • getRoutesSmallDescriptions

      public String getRoutesSmallDescriptions()
      Retrieves summarized descriptions of all Routes.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with summarized route information

    • getRouteInsideByID

      public Route getRouteInsideByID(int id)
      Retrieves a Route by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Route to find
      Returns:
      the matching Route object, or null if not found

    • getNewID

      public int getNewID()
      Generates a new unique ID for a Route.
      Returns:
      a unique integer ID

    • containsID

      public boolean containsID(int id)
      Checks whether a Route with the given ID exists in the collection.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the ID exists, false otherwise

    • countByDistance

      public int countByDistance(double distance)
      Counts the number of Routes that have the specified distance.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to match
      Returns:
      the number of matching Routes

    • countGreaterThanDistance

      public int countGreaterThanDistance(double distance)
      Counts the number of Routes with a distance greater than the specified value.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance threshold
      Returns:
      the count of Routes with greater distance

    • printFieldDescendingDistance

      public String printFieldDescendingDistance()
      Retrieves all Route distances sorted in descending order.
      Returns:
      a string representation of distances in descending order

      Returns a string representation of the collection with a summary of its elements.
